text: Eghtɨ gumazitam gavgavim igharaz darazir navibar anɨngamin fofozim ikɨva, egh a bar deravɨra ingangarir kam a damu. Eghtɨ gumazitam biziba isɨ gumazibagh anɨdir fofozim ikɨva, egh an avɨriba me danɨng. Eghtɨ gumazitam ingangarimɨn faragha zuir fofozim ikɨva, egh a deravɨra an apengan itir gumazibar ganɨva ingangarir kam damu. Eghtɨ gumazitam igharaz darazir apangkuvamin fofozim ikɨva, egh a men apangkuvsɨ bar akongegh mamaghɨra ikɨ.
